Search...

Ctrl K

Search...

Navigation

Custom Attributes

Update custom attribute in Account

PATCH

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

custom\_attribute\_definitions

/

{id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/custom_attribute_definitions/{id} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "attribute_display_name": "Custom Attribute",
  "attribute_display_type": 0,
  "attribute_description": "This is a custom attribute",
  "attribute_key": "custom_attribute",
  "attribute_values": [\
    "value1",\
    "value2"\
  ],
  "attribute_model": 0,
  "regex_pattern": "^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$",
  "regex_cue": "Please enter a valid value"
}'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "attribute_display_name": "<string>",
  "attribute_display_type": "<string>",
  "attribute_description": "<string>",
  "attribute_key": "<string>",
  "regex_pattern": "<string>",
  "regex_cue": "<string>",
  "attribute_values": "<string>",
  "attribute_model": "<string>",
  "default_value": "<string>",
  "created_at": "<string>",
  "updated_at": "<string>"
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The ID of the custom attribute to be updated.

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-attribute-display-name)

attribute\_display\_name

string

Attribute display name

Example:

`"Custom Attribute"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-attribute-display-type)

attribute\_display\_type

integer

Attribute display type (text- 0, number- 1, currency- 2, percent- 3, link- 4, date- 5, list- 6, checkbox- 7)

Example:

`0`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-attribute-description)

attribute\_description

string

Attribute description

Example:

`"This is a custom attribute"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-attribute-key)

attribute\_key

string

Attribute unique key value

Example:

`"custom_attribute"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-attribute-values)

attribute\_values

string\[\]

Attribute values

Example:

```
["value1", "value2"]
```

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-attribute-model)

attribute\_model

integer

Attribute type(conversation\_attribute- 0, contact\_attribute- 1)

Example:

`0`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-regex-pattern)

regex\_pattern

string

Regex pattern (Only applicable for type- text). The regex pattern is used to validate the attribute value(s).

Example:

`"^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#body-regex-cue)

regex\_cue

string

Regex cue message (Only applicable for type- text). The cue message is shown when the regex pattern is not matched.

Example:

`"Please enter a valid value"`

#### Response

200

200403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-id)

id

integer

Identifier

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-attribute-display-name)

attribute\_display\_name

string

Attribute display name

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-attribute-display-type)

attribute\_display\_type

string

Attribute display type (text, number, currency, percent, link, date, list, checkbox)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-attribute-description)

attribute\_description

string

Attribute description

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-attribute-key)

attribute\_key

string

Attribute unique key value

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-regex-pattern)

regex\_pattern

string

Regex pattern

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-regex-cue)

regex\_cue

string

Regex cue

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-attribute-values)

attribute\_values

string

Attribute values

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-attribute-model)

attribute\_model

string

Attribute type(conversation\_attribute/contact\_attribute)

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-default-value)

default\_value

string

Attribute default value

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-created-at)

created\_at

string

The date and time when the custom attribute was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-attributes/update-custom-attribute-in-account#response-updated-at)

updated\_at

string

The date and time when the custom attribute was updated
